name: Project Robopigeon
description:
In Project RoboPigeon, you're a conspiracy theorist truth seeker who has discovered the weakness of the robot bird cameras: a redbull powered egg shooter! Take out the robot pigeons before they pinpoint your location and send the government spooks down your head!

Developed with Yaseen Nagib, Garrett Sheehan, Nadiyah Garris, and Erin Marczewski as Sleepy King Studios' first game.
